snippet.title: Animal Shelter - Official Release Trailer | STEAM
snippet.description:
Animal Shelter Simulator is NOW available! Play on Steam! 👇
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1239320/Animal_Shelter/

If you want to open your own animal shelter, do it now! 🐶 🐱 Your main goal is to keep your four-legged friends happy and to take care of them. Pet them, give them treats, play with them and definitely they will pay you back with great trust. Find the best home for them. So, don't wait, open your own shelter now!  🐕‍🦺🐈

#animalshelter #game
